thread.title: Trump booed after attack on "nasty" press

title: Trump booed after attack on "nasty" press
text:
Trump booed after attack on "nasty" press 3:02pm GMT - 01:10 
U.S. President Trump elicited boos from the audience at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, Friday when he said ''It wasn't until I became a politician that I realized how nasty, how mean, how vicious and how fake the press can be.'' Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
U.S. President Trump elicited boos from the audience at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, Friday when he said "It wasn't until I became a politician that I realized how nasty, how mean, how vicious and how fake the press can be." Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2nfd4De
